title: General Accountant - Chinese [HCM], Upto 20 Mil
job_description:
- Input accounting data on software and allocate accounting entries (Invoicing, Settlements, Journal Entries).
- Oversee month-end closing, complete and review monthly accruals, journals..
- Monitor Oversea & Local account receivables, payables and internal payments.
- Be in charge of banking transactions and reconcile
- Be in charge to work with local tax agency.
- File hard and soft accounting document.
- Doing monthly/quarterly/yearly financial statements.
- Other tasks relating to taxation or accounting (i.e. update taxation rules and regulations, collect and synthesize accounting data as per request from management board...)
requirements:
- Good communication skills both written and verbal in Chinese (HSK4) / English
- Bachelor / Major: Accounting/Audit
- 2 years' experience in accounting. Highly preferred candidate from a freight forwarding company.
